page.title: 20Museum & Jewellery,Lockinge
page.content:
While doing this project we found that Lockinge Museum was included in the list of Oxfordshire Museums open to the public by arrangement.When we visited School House Mr.and Mrs.Wardingly showed us the collection they had built up over many years.They display it in the hall of their house.It includes items of social history from Lockinge Estate,many passed on by villagers when they realised that the family was interested in these artifacts.Also on display is an impressive array of fossils and minerals. Next door in the Old School, Miss Jill Smith designs and makes jewellery.She produces an imaginative range in silver and titanium and will undertake private commisions.
CHILDREN & STAFF OF WANTAGE CHURCH INFANTS' SCHOOL COMPILED THESE PAGES.
